awd_titl_txt: Novel Syntheses and Reactions of Indoles
awd_abstract_narration: This research will focus on the development of synthetic                        methodology for preparing the indole ring system.  This will be                 accomplished by use of an intramolecular ı2+2! cycloaddition                    reaction of arylamino ketenes containing a pendant alkene, to                   form fused indoline cyclobutanones.                                             %%%                                                                             With this Research in Undergraduate Institutions (RUI) award,                   the Synthetic Organic Program is supporting the research of Dr.                 Bjorn C. Soderberg of the Department Chemistry at the                           University of South Alabama.  The project will not only provide                 new methodology for synthesizing an important class of organic                  compounds, but will also provide excellent opportunities for                    research by undergraduates.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
